list_definition.definition: a place with a ticket office, waiting rooms etc, where trains, buses or coaches stop to allow passengers to get on or off

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She arrived at the station in good time for her train.

list_definition.definition: a local headquarters or centre of work of some kind

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How many fire-engines are kept at the fire station?

list_definition.definition: a post or position (eg of a guard or other person on duty)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The watchman remained at his station all night.

list_definition.definition: to put (a person, oneself, troops etc in a place or position to perform some duty)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He stationed himself at the corner of the road to keep watch
